title: Google Spreadsheets/ Google Apps Script / JS / JSON wizard for small utility
snippet:
I am looking for an expert on Google Spreadsheets/ Google Apps Script / JS / JSON wizard to create a small utility which does the following:

- import data from several JSON URLs (ongoing collection) into Google Spreadsheets (using ie. this script: https://github.com/fastfedora/google-docs/blob/master/scripts/ImportJSON/Code.gs)

- pull specific values from the JSON data into specific columns

- allow user to manually add/edit values

- export worksheet to csv with the click of a button

Needs to work simply and needs to be finished on Monday. Only independent freelancers, only with excellent command of English.
